You’re gonna be carrying their baby and give them a

Hi.

Look, you have to help me! Okay? I mean, I know what to do with awoman, y’know, I know where everything goes, it’s always nice. But I need toknow what makes it go from nice to, My God! Somebody’s killing her inthere!""
